In this instance, we will give a short introduction to R. We will work on some R basics that you will need for data manipulation and visualization. The session is geared towards everyone that has never used R before, and for everyone that would like to refresh their memory.

**Topic:** Introduction to R \
**When:** Monday, 21st of October, 09:45 \
**Where:** Campus Alnarp, Triticum
and via **[Zoom](https://slu-se.zoom.us/j/69486568642)**(Password: 410 410)

**Preparation:**
You are welcome to just come and listen. If you want to code along please bring your own laptop with R and R-studio installed. 

If you’re just curious and want to listen in, that’s also perfectly fine!
 

The material will be available on [Github](https://github.com/SLUBioinformaticsInfrastructure/Three_Bees_Workshop_Series) after the session.
